languages.text: After the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they gain +5% dodge reduction and parry reduction for each target affected by that attack, for the next melee attack.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, за каждую затронутую цель он получает +5% к снижению уклонения и снижению парирования при совершении следующей атаки в ближнем бою.

traits.locale_text: Grants +10% critical hit chance and +25% critical damage during the first round of combat.

After the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they gain +5% dodge reduction and parry reduction for each target affected by that attack, for the next melee attack.

After the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they gain +5% dodge reduction and parry reduction for each target affected by that attack, for the next melee attack.

The wearer gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} for each creature targeted by that area attack.

languages.text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, за каждую затронутую цель он получает +5% к снижению уклонения и снижению парирования при совершении следующей атаки в ближнем бою.
languages.original_text: After the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they gain +5% dodge reduction and parry reduction for each target affected by that attack, for the next melee attack.

traits.locale_text: При совершении атак рукопашным оружием по области персонаж получает +5% к снижению парирования и снижению уклонения за каждое затронутое существо.
При совершении атак рукопашным оружием по области персонаж получает +5% к снижению парирования и снижению уклонения за каждое затронутое существо.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を行うと、その攻撃の影響を受けたターゲット1体につき+5%の回避減少と受け流し減少を次の近接攻撃で獲得する。
languages.original_text: After the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they gain +5% dodge reduction and parry reduction for each target affected by that attack, for the next melee attack.

traits.locale_text: 使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}において、その攻撃の影響を受けたターゲット1体につき、次の近接攻撃で、+5%の回避減少と受け流し減少を得る。

languages.text: 装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}之后，此次范围攻击每影响到一个目标，下一次近战攻击的闪避减免与招架减免就提高5%。
languages.original_text: After the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they gain +5% dodge reduction and parry reduction for each target affected by that attack, for the next melee attack.

traits.locale_text: 装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}之后，此次范围攻击每影响到一个目标，下一次近战攻击的闪避减免与招架减免就提高5%。

languages.text: Cuando el portador realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, gana +5 % de reducción de esquiva y reducción de parada por cada objetivo afectado para su próximo ataque cuerpo a cuerpo.
languages.original_text: After the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they gain +5% dodge reduction and parry reduction for each target affected by that attack, for the next melee attack.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, gana +5 % de reducción de esquiva y reducción de parada por cada objetivo afectado para su próximo ataque cuerpo a cuerpo.

languages.text: Nach einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} erhält der Träger für jedes von diesem Ziel betroffene Ziel für den nächsten Nahkampfangriff +5% Ausweichen-Reduktion und Parieren-Reduktion.
languages.original_text: After the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they gain +5% dodge reduction and parry reduction for each target affected by that attack, for the next melee attack.

traits.locale_text: Nach einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} erhält der Träger für jedes von diesem Ziel betroffene Ziel für den nächsten Nahkampfangriff +5% Ausweichen-Reduktion und Parieren-Reduktion.

languages.text: Lorsque le porteur réalise une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, sa prochaine attaque en mêlée bénéficie d'un bonus de +5 % à la réduction d'esquive et à la réduction de parade pour chaque cible affectée par cette première attaque.
languages.original_text: After the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they gain +5% dodge reduction and parry reduction for each target affected by that attack, for the next melee attack.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le porteur réalise une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, sa prochaine attaque en mêlée bénéficie d'un bonus de +5 % à la réduction d'esquive et à la réduction de parade pour chaque cible affectée par cette première attaque.

Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} de l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduit{/g} de 5 % la parade et l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}esquive{/g} de la créature ciblée.

languages.text: After performing {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} wearer gains +{uip|Bonus|a26dda24638c47abb15eb9986d60ed91} dodge and parry reduction for the next melee attack.

traits.locale_text: After performing {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} wearer gains +{uip|Bonus|a26dda24638c47abb15eb9986d60ed91} dodge and parry reduction for the next melee attack.

languages.text: Takan kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirdiğinde bir sonraki yakın dövüş saldırısında o saldırıdan etkilenen her hedef için +%5 kaçınma azaltımı ve savuşturma azaltımı kazanır.
languages.original_text: After the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they gain +5% dodge reduction and parry reduction for each target affected by that attack, for the next melee attack.
